subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoy, the Colombian driver who jumped from Formula One to the American stock-car circuit late last season, got his first Cup victory in his 17th start.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoy, the Colombian driver who jumped from Formula One to the American stock-car circuit late last season, got his first Cup victory in his 17th start.
